duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide direct, hands-on services to clients with Intellectual and Developmental Disabilities (IDD) in various locations.
Respite care, person-centered supports, and supported employment services for clients with IDD.
Medication management including transport, documentation, and supervised provision of medication.

education_certification.credential: Proof of education (transcripts, diploma, GED, etc)
Current certification in CPR and First Aid preferred
Valid driver’s license with a vehicle in good running order and current auto insurance
